--- title: DCGAN keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Model for Training 2 and 3 dim GANs" ---

{% include image.html alt="Drawing" style="width: 1000px;" file="/deeptool/img/dcgan.png" %}

https://towardsdatascience.com/fake-face-generator-using-dcgan-model-ae9322ccfd65

class DCGAN[source]

DCGAN(device, args) :: Module

Modification of the DCGAN-Paper https://arxiv.org/pdf/1511.06434.pdf for 3-Dimensional tasks in MR-Imaging oriented on: https://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/dcgan_faces_tutorial.html

# 3 dim test
args.model_type = "dcgan"
args.dim = 3
args = compat_args(args)
test_one_batch(args)

# 2 dim test
args.dim = 2
args = compat_args(args)
test_one_batch(args)
